Title: Requires the department of civil service to establish an accessible list of persons with disabilities and veterans with disabilities employed by the state
Summary: Requires the department of civil service to establish an accessible list of persons with disabilities and veterans with disabilities employed by the state; and to make persons with disabilities and veterans with disabilities employed by the state eligible for the HELP program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to requiring the department of civil service to establish an accessible list of persons with disabilities and veterans with disabilities employed by the state; and to make persons with disabilities and veterans with disabilities employed by the state eligible for the HELP program
